products.title: Turin 25mm Lavender Purple Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. This vibrant purplevenetian blind is perfect to brighten up any room in your home with a splash of colour. Product id: db-dpfven0363 fabric colour: lavender purple s25025 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their plum colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce some sophisticated colour into their room.
